recommendations: Yael Kochman 🎗️ “Toot is an amazing person to work with. I had the pleasure of having her lead a pitching workshop for 6 Fash&Tech startups as they were getting ready to pitch to investors at our event. Toot organized the workshop, which included both 1:1 sessions with each startup and a joint session for practicing. She was professional, inspiring and dependable. I would be delighted to work with Toot again in the future and would highly recommend her to anyone who needs a speaker, a speaking coach or any other service.”

Vasken S. “Toot is an excellent resource and a great connector. She's been a tremendous help to the further development of the communities and startup ecosystem of Albania. Toot is also a great connector of key people across ecosystems. Really enjoyed and learned a lot during the week following her speaking to students and facilitating the Community Builders Workshop.”

volunteer_experience.info: The Global Shapers Community is a network of Hubs developed and led by young people who are exceptional in their potential, their achievements, and their drive to make a contribution to their communities. The Global Shapers Community is an initiative of the World Economic Forum.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Global Shapers Community
volunteer_experience.title: Vice Curator of the Tel-Aviv Hub

volunteer_experience.info: Mentored and Pitch-trained the Winning Startup of the 2014 Challenge and the 2nd Place Winning Startup of 2015.Pioneers gathers the smartest minds in technology and science entrepreneurship at over 80 annual events and occasions to showcase, impact and shape our tomorrow.Pioneers Festival is an international, educating and inspiring high-quality festival focusing on entrepreneurship, tech startups and innovative future technologies.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Pioneers.io
volunteer_experience.title: Startups Coach & Pitch Trainer

volunteer_experience.info: Founded in 2008, the Kairos Society is a non-profit organization based in the United States. We work to find and empower the young pioneers who will push the world forward through entrepreneurship and innovation - we do so with the support of the top universities, mentors, and corporations across the globe.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Kairos Society
volunteer_experience.title: Regional Executive Director

volunteer_experience.info: Startup Live is a 3-day startup event that provides networking, resources and incentives for individuals and teams to go from idea to launch in 72 hours. The event connects its participants with local and international experienced entrepreneurs, experts and investors. As such It doesn’t serve as a singular happening but is a great journey of building up a European startup ecosystem that helps and supports existing and future entrepreneurs.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Startup Live GmbH
volunteer_experience.title: Israeli Ambassador & Event Chief
